com.team30.game.game_mechanics

Class NpcContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team30.game.game_mechanics.NpcContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityContainer

    public class NpcContainer
extends Object
implements EntityContainer
    Handles all concurrent npcs, and rendering of them
